headline: Airbnb CEO Brian Chesky Argues That AI Is 'Mostly Going To Be A Tool,' But Warns That Without Gen Z At The Bottom, There Will Be No Leaders At The Top
summary: Airbnb Inc. (NASDAQ:ABNB) CEO Brian Chesky warned that excluding young professionals from the workforce could create a leadership void in the future as companies rely more on artificial intelligence. "We need to make room for people early in their careers, even if AI can do the interns' work," Chesky told ABC News. He said that while AI can handle many entry-level tasks, companies that close off opportunities to young workers risk losing the next generation of leaders. Don't Miss: The ‘ChatGPT o
